author: Lenore Hasler
comment: I can't add more contacts. I can't enlarge their heads. I can't resize the size of the app. I can't have the app open like it was on the V10 so I can hit the contacts head and either call or message. I haven't been able to find another app in the store that's better than this one. Until I do I'm stuck with this you need to do something to fix it. This is why I'm giving you one star only.

reply.author: StaticBloc
reply.content: The way you add contacts is by making them a favorite contact. The widget is able to be resized, and you can open the app from the widget or the app drawer. You can call or message a contact by tapping on their photo.

author: Dan & Melissa Malin
comment: Does what I want, so I really like it. I wish it would just automatically call the person when you first touch the contacts square instead of making you do a few clicks. But that is my only complaint, so obviously a minor one :)

author: Liz Kimura
comment: I world rate they app better if it did what it's supposed to do.  If you set a default number, it does not automatically call....I have to open the app, click on my favorite, then hit the number....just may go back to my other favorites...not that I want to with the system update putting all my favorites in alphabetical order with no ability to re order them

reply.author: StaticBloc
reply.content:
If you go into the app settings, there is a quick dial option. That will cause the default number to be dialed when the favorite is clicked. 

Default number by itself just specifies which number should be displayed first (mimicking the Android contacts app).

author: Gene Williams
comment: It does save me some time searching contacts but has a few bugs that are annoying on my LG G6. Like sometimes it won't display or scroll the favorites. 3.5 stars might be more appropriate.

author: Paul Goddard
comment: I loved this widget/app until it started to rearrange my favorites with no apparent rhyme or reason. Since the latest update, the problem appears to be gone. I deeply appreciate the developer addressing and fixing the problem so quickly! A 5 star app with 5 star customer service!! Thanks!!!

reply.author: StaticBloc
reply.content: Thanks for using the app! We just started rolling out an update that fixes the contact reordering, and it should be on all devices within a week. Feel free to reach out to us at info@staticbloc.com if you have any questions.

author: Ava Raymore-Jones
comment: I arranged the first four contact because I call them everyday. But if I call someone, somewhere else in the grid, the whole grid Scrabbles, and I have to find my everyday friends again. Not cool😵😵😵

reply.author: StaticBloc
reply.content: Thanks for using the app! We just started rolling out an update that fixes the contact reordering, and it should be on all devices within a week. Feel free to reach out to us at info@staticbloc.com if you have any questions.

author: Kenneth Wiley
comment: I like it very much. One glitch is it disappears back to widgets sometimes. Good job.
Easy to use and allows access to all contact info. Only criticism would be it keeps dropping photos of some contacts off.

author: Kay Farris
comment: Absolutely love the functionality of this app. I've been using it over a year now. Easy to customize, holds all my most important contacts, let's me add contact pics/images & uses minimal space on screen! Easily one of the best apps out there!!

author: Shahid Mahmood
comment: I think it's a good app but lot can be improved like itshould dial the default no by just pressing icon.

author: Brenda Lopez
comment: I love this app...easy access to my frequently used contacts...especially while driving.also added it to my mom's phone so she doesn't have to get lost in her phone's menu lol... She has all her frequently used contacts on her side page just a swipe away 😉2 👍👍 up for this app...
Small screen footprint when not in use; but holds good number of contacts.

author: Lotta R Cleary
comment: It doesn't work like it should haveto press call twice
this app is great you have all your favorite contacts in one area

reply.author: StaticBloc
reply.content: Thanks for the review! Please email us at info@staticbloc.com to let us know what would make this a 5 star app for you.

author: Kevin McSwiggen
comment: Good app but keeps changing my order of favorite people even when I don't use them that often.

reply.author: StaticBloc
reply.content:
Hello Kevin,

We've recently released an update that fixes that bug. Please email us at info@staticbloc.com if you still experience it.

comment: Does as intended without being intrusive. I love efficiency of space and all in one design and this delivers. Happy to have it!

author: Richard Ouimet
comment: Useful, easy to use app & widget but only favorites. Would like to see more categories. ie family, work, friends, etc.

author: K. Taylor
comment: Replacing an app I used to have with HTC but is now gone on my new HTC U11.  Works great!

author: Al Pierce
comment: Some lost function has been restored with the last upgrade and the icon scramble has been fixed. Still a lot of room for improvement.

author: Barbara Paris
comment: It was fine before 3x4 now its only 3x3 change it back please and ill rate it higher

author: martin graber
comment: This is a great app. Does what it's meant to do. This is my 3rd phone that I put it on and it works like a charm.

author: Michael Otto
comment: Wish I could edit which contacts it shows but I use it all the time.  I have a homescreen page dedicated to it.

reply.author: StaticBloc
reply.content: Thanks for your review. It will show your starred contacts from any Google account on the device. You can star/unstar contacts to show/remove them from being displayed. You can edit the order they're shown in by long pressing on a contact tile, and dragging it where you want it to go.

author: Glyn Royds
comment: Works well enough. Ability to set a default action to each contact would be my only request.

author: Amornthep Lertthasanawong
comment: Still work as expected. Great.

reply.author: StaticBloc
reply.content: Thanks for using the app! We just started rolling out an update that fixes the contact reordering, and it should be on all devices within a week. Feel free to reach out to us at info@staticbloc.com if you have any questions.

author: Duane DenBoer
comment: Would love this app if it didn't rearrange my contacts all the time!
Dies everything I need it to.

author: Ciprian Stoianovici
comment: More customizable features would be nice. Anyway, it's great!
Works for what I need it for.

author: Eric Temples
comment: It's a good app but needs some features add

author: doug thompson
comment: Useful but not indispensable.

author: Usha Khanna
comment: Not good texture

author: Michael Jones
comment: All my most used contacts in ONE place.
Just a really handy app.  Makes life easier.

author: G Mar
comment: Good app. Wish the widget was more modern

author: Jeanne Bornstein
comment: Love to have my favorites close at hand.

author: Donna Klug
comment: I use this app every day, love it
Very good app. I liked it very much.

author: Rhonda Blakney
comment: Love having my favorites and pictures handy

author: Jamie Demaris
comment: Samsung took my favorite s away

author: Hannan Ahmed
comment: It's OK
